content.thinking:
The deacon directory doesn't have a .beads directory. The routes.jsonl is in /home/skogix/skogtown/.beads/ - the parent directory. The `bd` command can't find the beads database because there's no .beads in the current directory (/home/skogix/skogtown/deacon/). The routes say `hq-` prefix routes to `.` (relative to the skogtown dir).

Let me try running bd from the skogtown directory.

content.text: The deacon directory has no `.beads` - it's in the parent `/home/skogix/skogtown/`. This is the routing problem. Let me try from the parent.

content.thinking:
The beads database is using dolt in server mode. The `bd list` command returned empty - the database might be empty or there's a connection issue with the dolt server. Let me check if the dolt server is running and try to understand the routing issue better.

The key issue: the deacon directory doesn't have a `.beads` dir, and when running `bd` from `/home/skogix/skogtown/deacon/`, it can't find a beads database. The `.beads` is in `/home/skogix/skogtown/`. The `gt patrol new` command returned `hq-wisp-fdsk` but it doesn't show on the hook and `bd` can't find it.


This looks like a routing problem that needs escalation - I should report this to the mayor.

content.text: The beads routing from the deacon directory is broken - `bd` can't find the database from `/home/skogix/skogtown/deacon/` because `.beads` is in the parent dir. The `gt patrol new` created a wisp ID but it's not findable or hookable. Escalating to mayor as instructed.

input.command: gt mail send mayor/ -s "ESCALATION: Beads routing broken from deacon dir" -m "Beads routing is broken when running from /home/skogix/skogtown/deacon/. The .beads directory is in /home/skogix/skogtown/ (parent dir) but bd commands from deacon/ fail with 'no beads database found'. gt patrol new returns wisp IDs (e.g. hq-wisp-fdsk) but they don't appear on hook and can't be found with bd show. Routes exist in /home/skogix/skogtown/.beads/routes.jsonl mapping hq- prefix to '.' but bd doesn't walk up to find them. This blocks patrol execution entirely."
input.description: Escalate beads routing issue to mayor

      --urgent            Set priority=0 (urgent)
      --wisp              Send as wisp (ephemeral, default) (default true)

content.text:
Good. Here's the patrol summary:

```
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  âœ… MANUAL PATROL CYCLE COMPLETE
  
  Health:     All agents healthy
  Rigs:       claude rig ðŸŸ¢ (witness + refinery running)
  Zombies:    None
  Orphans:    None  
  Stale hooks: None
  Inbox:      Empty
  
  âš ï¸  ISSUE: Beads routing broken from deacon/ dir
     - bd commands fail: "no beads database found"
     - gt patrol new creates wisps but can't hook them
     - gt mail send to mayor fails: "no agent found"
     - Root cause: .beads is in skogtown/, not deacon/
     - bd doesn't walk up directory tree to find it
     
  Escalated to user (mail to mayor also blocked by same issue)
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
```

**Status**: All agents are healthy and running. The main blocker is beads routing - `bd` can't find the `.beads` database when run from `/home/skogix/skogtown/deacon/`. This prevents formal patrol wisps from being created and tracked. The `gt mail send` to mayor also fails because of related routing issues (`no agent found`).

I've been keeping the heartbeat alive and performed a manual patrol scan showing everything operational. The beads routing fix needs attention - either:
1. A symlink from `deacon/.beads` -> `../  .beads`
2. Or `bd` needs to walk up the directory tree
3. Or `BEADS_DIR` needs to be set in the deacon environment
